api_list.name: /regex/nospecial/
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://regex_everything.p.rapidapi.com/regex/nospecial/sdfsdf@sdf!!!!"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "regex_everything.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://regex_everything.p.rapidapi.com/regex/nospecial/{value}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "regex_everything.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
